data.actual_result: The line from how tall the message bar was before the message was sent appears
data.short_description: Top line from the message box shows when sending a multi-line message on poor connection
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're on poor connection - Type a message that is at least 2 lines long (bug will not occur if message is only one line long) - Observe where the top of the message box before sending the message - Watch where the top of the message box was as you send the message - May not happen every time, so try multiple times
